SEARCH
Package lt.viko.eif.esemasko.soap.soap.student

Class MoviesEndpoint

java.lang.Object
lt.viko.eif.esemasko.soap.soap.student.MoviesEndpoint
@Endpoint public class MoviesEndpoint extends Object
The MoviesEndpoint class handles SOAP requests for the movie web service.

This class maps incoming SOAP requests to corresponding methods and uses the MoviesRepository to process the requests.

Since:
1.0

      Parameters:
      request - contains the title of the movie to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a response containing the requested movie

      Parameters:
